mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM Export_Record WHERE Export_no = #{Export_no}
SELECT count(*) FROM Export_Record WHERE Order_no_details = #{Order_no_details} and flag=0
mapper.sql: Export_no, Staff_no, Order_no_details, Source_place, Target_place, Delivery_date, Transport_link, Progress
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from Export_Record where flag=0
order by ${orderByClause}
select Export_no from Export_Record order by Export_no desc limit 1

select * from Export_Record where flag=0 and to_days(Delivery_date) = to_days(#{Delivery_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and Export_no like '%${Export_no}%' and Staff_no like '%${Staff_no}%' and Order_no_details like '%${Order_no_details}%' and Target_place like '%${Target_place}%' and Source_place like '%${Source_place}%' order by Delivery_date desc
select count(*) from Export_Record where flag=0

select
from Export_Record where Export_no = #{Export_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0
select * from Export_Record where Order_no_details = #{Order_no_details,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0
select * from Export_Record where Order_no_details like '${Order_no}%' and flag=0
select * from Export_Record where flag=0 order by Delivery_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into Export_Record (Export_no, Staff_no, Order_no_details, Source_place, Target_place, Delivery_date, Transport_link, Progress) values (#{Export_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Staff_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Order_no_details,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Source_place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Target_place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Delivery_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{Transport_link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Progress,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

Export_no = #{record.Export_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Staff_no = #{record.Staff_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

Delivery_date = #{record.Delivery_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

Export_no = #{Export_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Staff_no = #{Staff_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Order_no_Progress= #{Order_no_details,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Source_place = #{Source_place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Target_place = #{Target_place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where Export_no = #{Export_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
